symbols.name: Straightness
symbols.unicode_glyph_or_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 64 64' width='48' height='48'><line x1='8' y1='32' x2='56' y2='32' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='6' stroke-linecap='round'/></svg>
symbols.what_it_controls: Form of a line element (or axis) without datums
symbols.figure: Two parallel lines bounding a line element

symbols.name: Flatness
symbols.unicode_glyph_or_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 64 64' width='48' height='48'><polygon points='14,22 52,22 44,42 6,42' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/></svg>
symbols.what_it_controls: Form of a surface independent of datums

symbols.name: Circularity (Roundness)
symbols.unicode_glyph_or_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 64 64' width='48' height='48'><circle cx='32' cy='32' r='18' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/></svg>

symbols.name: Cylindricity
symbols.unicode_glyph_or_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 64 64' width='48' height='48'><circle cx='32' cy='32' r='18' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/><circle cx='32' cy='32' r='12' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/></svg>
symbols.what_it_controls: Form of an entire cylindrical surface
do_dont: Do use when roundness+straightness+parallelism are needed

symbols.name: Profile of a Line
symbols.unicode_glyph_or_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 64 64' width='48' height='48'><path d='M4 44 C 14 24, 30 64, 44 36 S 60 28, 60 28' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/></svg>
symbols.what_it_controls: 2D outline at each cross-section (may use datums)
symbols.figure: Uniform boundary around a line element

symbols.name: Profile of a Surface
symbols.unicode_glyph_or_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 64 64' width='48' height='48'><path d='M4 44 C 14 24, 30 64, 44 36 S 60 28, 60 28' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/><path d='M4 40 C 14 20, 30 60, 44 32 S 60 24, 60 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.6'/></svg>
symbols.what_it_controls: 3D form relative to basic dimensions; may include datums
do_dont: Do use to control form and sometimes orientation/location
Don't pair with redundant form controls
symbols.figure: Uniform boundary around the true surface

symbols.name: Angularity
symbols.unicode_glyph_or_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 64 64' width='48' height='48'><path d='M14 50 L50 14' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/><path d='M14 50 L50 50' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/></svg>
symbols.what_it_controls: Orientation at a specified angle to a datum
symbols.figure: Zone oriented at basic angle to datum

symbols.name: Perpendicularity
symbols.unicode_glyph_or_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 64 64' width='48' height='48'><path d='M18 10 L18 54' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/><path d='M18 46 L54 46' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/></svg>
symbols.what_it_controls: Orientation of a surface/axis at 90° to a datum
symbols.zone_shape: two parallel planes (or cylinder for axis)

symbols.name: Parallelism
symbols.unicode_glyph_or_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 64 64' width='48' height='48'><path d='M12 20 L52 20' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/><path d='M12 44 L52 44' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/></svg>
symbols.zone_shape: two parallel planes (or cylinder for axis)

symbols.name: Position
symbols.unicode_glyph_or_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 64 64' width='48' height='48'><circle cx='32' cy='32' r='18' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/><line x1='32' y1='10' x2='32' y2='54' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/><line x1='10' y1='32' x2='54' y2='32' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/></svg>
symbols.what_it_controls: Location of a feature relative to datums
symbols.typical_use: Holes, pins, patterns relative to DRF
do_dont: Do reference a proper datum set
symbols.figure: A hole located relative to datums A|B|C

symbols.name: Circular Runout
symbols.unicode_glyph_or_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 64 64' width='48' height='48'><circle cx='32' cy='32' r='16' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/><path d='M48 16 A20 20 0 0 1 54 32' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4' marker-end='url(#arrow)'/><defs><marker id='arrow' markerWidth='8' markerHeight='8' refX='4' refY='4' orient='auto-start-reverse'><path d='M0,0 L8,4 L0,8 z' fill='currentColor'/></marker></defs></svg>
symbols.what_it_controls: Composite of form and orientation per circular element

symbols.name: Total Runout
symbols.unicode_glyph_or_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 64 64' width='48' height='48'><circle cx='32' cy='32' r='16' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/><path d='M18 14 A24 24 0 0 1 50 14' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4' marker-end='url(#ar2)'/><path d='M14 50 A24 24 0 0 0 50 50' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4' marker-end='url(#ar2)'/><defs><marker id='ar2' markerWidth='8' markerHeight='8' refX='4' refY='4' orient='auto-start-reverse'><path d='M0,0 L8,4 L0,8 z' fill='currentColor'/></marker></defs></svg>
symbols.what_it_controls: Composite of all circular runout elements across full surface
do_dont: Don't use when circular runout suffices

symbols.name: Concentricity (legacy)
symbols.unicode_glyph_or_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 64 64' width='48' height='48'><circle cx='32' cy='32' r='18' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4'/><circle cx='32' cy='32' r='6' fill='currentColor'/></svg>
symbols.what_it_controls: Median points about a datum axis (difficult to inspect)

symbols.name: Symmetry (legacy)
symbols.unicode_glyph_or_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 64 64' width='48' height='48'><path d='M32 8 L32 56' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M12 28 L32 36 L12 44 Z' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M52 28 L32 36 L52 44 Z' fill='currentColor'/></svg>
symbols.what_it_controls: Median plane of opposed elements (difficult to inspect)
